title: How to Make Campfire in Little Alchemy 2: Full Recipe Guide

steps.title: Combine Fire + Wood to create Campfire.
steps.content: Combine Fire + Wood to create Campfire. You can create this element with or without Time , which is unlocked by discovering at least 100 elements. [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to create Campfire: With Time : Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Plant + Time = Tree Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Stone + Fire = Metal Stone + Metal = Blade Blade + Metal = Sword Tree + Sword = Wood Fire + Wood = Campfire Without Time : Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Planet + Fire = Sun Sun + Energy = Solar cell Solar cell + Sun = Electricity Glass + Electricity = Light bulb Human + Light bulb = Idea Human + Idea = Philosophy Planet + Philosophy = Big Plant + Big = Tree Stone + Fire = Metal Stone + Metal = Blade Blade + Metal = Sword Tree + Sword = Wood Fire + Wood = Campfire

steps.title: Combine Fire + Wood to create Campfire.
steps.content: Combine Fire + Wood to create Campfire. If you don't have those elements unlocked, you'll just need to combine a few of the base elements beforehand. Here's the fastest way to create Campfire: Water + Earth = Mud Water + Air = Rain Earth + Rain = Plant Mud + Plant = Swamp Air + Fire = Energy Swamp + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Human Earth + Fire = Lava Air + Lava = Stone Fire + Stone = Metal Human + Metal = Tool Stone + Air = Sand Fire + Sand = Glass Sand + Glass = Time Plant + Time = Tree Tool + Tree = Wood Fire + Wood = Campfire

steps.title: You can create other elements with Campfire in Little Alchemy 1 and 2.
steps.content: You can create other elements with Campfire in Little Alchemy 1 and 2. Make sure to use the recipes for the version you're using. Little Alchemy 2 : Campfire + Water/Time/Rain/Paper = Ash Campfire + Pig/Ham = Bacon Campfire + Metal/Steel/Garden/House/Meat = Bbq Campfire + Witch = Cauldron Campfire + Human = Cook Campfire + Wolf = Dog Campfire + House/Brick/Wall/Container = Fireplace Campfire + Gun = Flamethrower Campfire + Sugar = Marshmallows Campfire + Water/Time/Storm = Smoke Campfire + Fabric = Smoke signal Campfire + Story = Human Little Alchemy 1 : Campfire + Meat/Garden = Bbq Campfire + Witch = Cauldron Campfire + House/Brick/Wall = Fireplace Campfire + Sugar = Marshmallows Campfire + Fabric = Smoke signal Campfire + Human = Story
